title: When my ex wife files for bankruptcy, will I be liable for her debts?
question: When my ex wife files for bankruptcy, will I be liable for her debts? She has a green card, not a US citizen yet. I signed the I 864 Affidavit of Support 4 years ago. She never used any public assistance programs. Her debts are mostly credit card debts.
answers: Unless you have joint debts, the answer is no. But if you do have joint debts then depending on your overall financial situation, Bankruptcy may be right for you. An experienced CA Bankruptcy attorney will be able to determine which type of Bankruptcy is the correct one for you. Use AVVO's Find a Lawyer tool to select a qualified attorney. Good luck.
